MatterMost IIT Jodhpur
Mattermost Messaging Platform:In order to reduce the dependency on third-party vendors and keep our communication data (which is absolutely critical to be in our hands) with IIT Jodhpur itself, Computer Center hosted an open-source MatterMost Messaging platform.
Mattermost provides secure communication, collaboration, and orchestration of work across teams and tools.
Currently, the mattermost messaging platform is capped to the IITJ domain.
However, users can register directly on the link:-https://mm.iitj.ac.inwith the IITJODHPUR email address.

We have enabled us to do meetings directly from mattermost
A) WebEx meeting with your IITJ login id:-

B) Jitsi in-house video conferencing directly from Mattermost:-
